programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason is joined by ex-Ferrari F1 driver Mika Salon to pit the brand new £100,000 Mercedes C63 AMG Black Series against its key rival from BMW. Tiff celebrates the iconic Ferrari F40's 25th birthday with a track drive of one of the best in the world.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato race two of the fastest off-roaders currently on sale, the Audi Q7 V12 and the Porsche Cayenne Turbo. Jonny Smith tests the brand new Lotus Evora S. Vicki Butler-Henderson drives Jaguar's most luxurious car - the XJ.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and rally driver Mark Higgins set Olympic Skeleton Bob gold medallist Amy Williams and World Pentathlete champion Samantha Murray a track challenge. Expect car damage and the closest ever finish to a Fifth Gear celebrity contest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason team up with F1 aces Johnny Herbert and Karun Chandhok for the ultimate dogfight. Vicki tests Vauxhall's new compact MPV, the Meriva. Ben samples the motorsport Autograss, and Jonny sees what motoring delights he can find for £5000.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato drives Aston Martin's latest supercar through the mountains of Southern Spain, Jonny Smith takes Citroen's DS3 Racing to an incredible road in Norway.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this episode Fifth Gear re-unites two of the greatest names in Formula 1 history - Prost and Senna. This time it's Ayrton's nephew Bruno and Alain's son Nico who will do battle on the track.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear sees if there is any truth in the old cliches - who are the better drivers, men or women? Can women park? Are men better at map reading? Which is the stronger sex on the race-track?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff tests this grand tourer's handling through the dramatic scenery of Snowdonia in Wales. Jason Plato tests the brand new £115,000 Aston Martin DB9 Volante, one of the fastest cabriolets on sale today.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson test drives Volvo's new off-roader. He concludes because of their attention to safety, the environment and the family-size accommodation Volvo have created a different kind of 4x4.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki meets 12 times Motor Trials champion and British motorcycling legend Dougie Lampkin. Jonny investigates another way of making cash from old cars. Jason takes the Ford Focus RS in the first TV drive of Ford's awesome new hot hatch.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear Quentin Willson and Tiff Needell stage a massive head-on collision by piloting two remote controlled cars into each other at 60 mph.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford takes puts the Grande Punto Abarth through its hot hatch paces. Tim Shaw finds out if it's possible to save huge amounts of money by servicing your car yourself. Bruno Senna joins the programme as a special guest presenter.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson road tests Vauxhall's new Vectra. He finds it very dull to look at inside and out. The 2.2 litre petrol engine feels slow. On the plus side it's better than the model it replaces.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits the brand-new Renault Sport Clio 200 against a tough competitor from the past - the Renault Clio 182 Cup. Retired Formula One driver, and current TV pundit David Coulthard, meets up with Tiff Needell for an extreme van driving challenge

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: We reveal the Best Cheap Car in Britain, meet the man who's giving away a free Ferrari to try and help sell his house, and a look round the country's ultimate supercar collection.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson road tests the new Hyundai Coupé. It was massively praised by motoring journalists on its launch it Italy. They even likened the £14,000 South Korean car to a mini Ferrari 456.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki is at the controls in a classic Ford v Vauxhall battle, two boy racer specials, the Fiesta ST and Corsa SRi, wage war to find out which is fastest. Tom journeys to the Arctic Circle to test the Volvo XC70, an estate car with four wheel drive.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell has a tough assignment. Our selfless road tester has to fly to Nice to drive the ultimate Mercedes-Benz, the flagship of the range, the £120,000 plus CL65.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out if the new 207 GTi is as exhilarating to drive as the 20 year old hot hatch the 205GTi; Fifth Gear conducts a fascinating world's first crash test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford flies out on Alan Sugar's private jet to test the brand new Audi TT, Vicki Butler-Henderson attempts a new land speed record, and Tiff Needell enters the inaugural D1GB drifting competition.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson tries to crack 150mph as she makes an attempt on the Blindfolded Land Speed World Record. Can Vicki hold her nerve and set a new record for driving in a straight line?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason head for the racetrack in the KTM X-Bow and Lotus 2-Eleven. Jonny investigates the smarter and apparently plusher qualities to be found in the latest Golf. Tom conducts a shocking crash test which is essential viewing for all families.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is at Anglesey for another Fifth Gear shoot-out. This time it's super chic superminis, the BMW Mini One against the Fiat 500. Jason Plato delivers his verdict on the Nissan Skyline now re-badged as the GT-R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato gets a world's first test drive in the £380,000 Pagani Zonda F. Vicki Butler-Henderson heads to our Anglesey test track to race a Porsche 911 against the latest Lotus Exige.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell teams up with supermodel Jodie Kidd to race a Maserati at the Monza grand prix circuit in Italy. Jason Plato visits the Top Marques Monaco Motorshow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In an astonishing series of experiments Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson find out just how dangerous ordinary items can be, and how you can best keep them under control in our cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is finding out if progress has been made by Mitsubishi, as she races a classic Evo 6 against the very latest Evo 9.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason drive an off-road playground, in a variety of tanks from submersible Russian machines to a British Chieftain battle tank. Tom Ford is one of the first people in the country to drive the brand new and utterly bonkers Tramontana R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford's been testing the Mazda's new MX5 Roadster Coupe; and Vicki Butler-Henderson has been thrashing Porsche's 911 GT3.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Quentin Willson enlists the help of a car psychologist to cure one sufferer who finds it impossible to drive without swearing profusely at other drivers.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason & Tiff pit the new Ford Focus RS against Mitsubishi Evo X. Audi's new Lamborghini engined supercar, the R8 V10, is under scrutiny. Tom Ford examines the brand new Citroen C3 Picasso from the point of view of a truly 21st Century family man.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw is the latest car nut to join the team, and he's been specially tasked with standing up for the beleaguered motorist. Jason Plato and Tiff Needell go head to head on the track to find out which car is fastest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson road tests the new performance version of Alfa Romeo's 156. She likes it and reckons it ranks alongside performance saloons from BMW, Subaru and Mitsubishi.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato helps a lottery winner choose a new supercar, Tiff Needell road tests the new Jaguar XK on the best road in the world, and Tom Ford meets Jenson Button at the Geneva Motorshow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson will be in Surrey for the The Mini World Show, a 45th Birthday Party for the Mini - attracting masterpieces from all over the world.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out which is quickest, the VW Golf GTi or Subaru Impreza WRX. Jonny proves there are still some amazing cars that you can buy for under £1500. Jason tests the Lotus Elise to find out if this is the finest car Lotus has ever produced.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith is at the biggest American car show in the world - which takes place just outside a small town in Sweden. He judges the prestigious best in show competition, goes on a late night cruise and tests the brand new Corvette Grand Sport.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith is in Sweden testing the brand new Volvo S60 Polestar super saloon against its racing car cousin - the competition car of double Swedish Touring Car Champion Fredrick Ekblom.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith is in France, experiencing the action packed world of Rallycross; a cross between rallying and circuit racing, where 650bhp machines battle door to door.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato is joined by ex-Formula One driver Karun Chandhok to battle it out on the track in two of the most sort-after super sports cars; Porsche 911 GT3 RS vs Nissan GT-R Nismo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato gets behind the wheel of his favourite Porsches and puts them up against some iconic competition

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Tiff Needell are joined by Ayrton Senna's nephew, Bruno Senna, to conduct their fastest ever track test. They hold a thrilling race between the brand new Porsche 911 Turbo S and two supercar rivals from Noble and Nissan.
